item.description:
***Harpoon has brought back the Friday night Friend of Harpoon special. Entry coat is $10.00 with your Friend of Harpoon card and includes 1 drink ticket***

This is the unofficial start of the Annual St. Patrick's Festival Celebration in Boston.

If you enjoy beer and great bands you should attend this party that takes place at the Harpoon Brewery in heated tents. There is no rain date. It goes if it snows too.

Doors open at 5:30pm and close at 9:30pm. Event ends at 11:00pm.

There are no advance ticket sales.

Capacity is limited.

Cover charge is $20.00 per person and includes souvenir cup and 1 drink ticket.

Cash bar is $5.00 per drink.

Irish and other food is available for purchase.

Check out the Irish and othe bands to perform as posted on line.

We encourage everyone to take the T.

Harpoon shuttles will be available from the Federal Reserve Building at South Station.

Please visit www.harpoonbrewery.com or call 888harpoon ext 3 for more details.

There is a designated driver offer from Harpoon.

Become a Friend of Harpoon today on line.

We expect to be there by 6:30pm.

We will be wearing Green.

This is a 21 plus event.

Band schedule will be posted the week of the event.

If you are going and RSVP we will do a followup E Mail the day before the event.
item.how_to_find_us: RSVPs have been E Mailed on Thursday night.
item.name: Harpoon St. Patrick's Festival at Harpoon Brewery
